Description: The traces of the prey led her here. Fortunately, she wasn't alone.\nYou will have the support of M4-Medic Bot, Sentry Gun, and Shark-speare.

Fierce enemies have appeared in the ruins. Machiavelli, the owner of the ruins, sent Excavator and Explorer to assist in killing the Corrupted. Machiavelli himself will also join the battle when needed.\nYou will have the support of Machiavelli, Excavator, and Explorer.
We once separated due to different positions and now the battle has brought us together again.\nYou will have the support of Luna and Unknown Construct α.
Forget about fractions and face up to the brand-new challenge.\nYou will be able to use all support units in this chapter.
